name: Bonds of C'Lena
flavorText: His dark pupils and wry smile reflected the lifeless skeletons he brought back to serve the Balance.
flavorTextHtml: His dark pupils and wry smile reflected the lifeless skeletons he brought back to serve the Balance.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Army of the Dead deals 85% increased damage or double this bonus against an active target of Command Skeletons. (Necromancer Only) [75 - 100]%
